basic.description: Students will be required to attend the Departmental seminar program and present a seminar based upon their graduate thesis research. Students will also provide a proposal for their thesis research which includes a review of the related literature. Departmental faculty will evaluate both the seminar and the proposal/review. Enrolment extending over 6 terms (2 years; required for new Master¿s level Physiology graduate students.  1 hour seminar/week; Fall, Winter and Spring/Summer.  N. Magoski.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Physiology Seminar Program
